    • acceptMessage

      public AMessage acceptMessage​(AMessage msg)
      Process a message received by the EFinder agent, by returning an appropriate answer It should answer to moveto and detectsat messages
      Parameters:
      msg - message sent by the Agent
      Returns:
      a msg with the answer to return to the agent

    • hasEnvelopeAt

      private boolean hasEnvelopeAt​(int x, int y)
      Check if there is an envelope in a certain location
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate to check
      y - y coordinate to check
      Returns:
      true or false depending on if there is an envelope or not

    • withinLimits

      public boolean withinLimits​(int x, int y)
      Check if position x,y is within the limits of the WorldDim x WorldDim world
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate of agent position
      y - y coordinate of agent position
      Returns:
      true if (x,y) is within the limits of the world
